extensions.title: DevLens
extensions.description: Quickly inspect page layouts and visualize element boundaries.

extensions.title: StyleSpy
extensions.description: Instantly analyze and copy CSS from any webpage element.

extensions.title: SpeedBoost
extensions.description: Optimizes browser resource usage to accelerate page loading.

extensions.title: JSONWizard
extensions.description: Formats, validates, and prettifies JSON responses in-browser.

extensions.title: TabMaster Pro
extensions.description: Organizes browser tabs into groups and sessions.

extensions.title: ViewportBuddy
extensions.description: Simulates various screen resolutions directly within the browser.

extensions.title: Markup Notes
extensions.description: Enables annotation and notes directly onto webpages for collaborative debugging.

extensions.title: GridGuides
extensions.description: Overlay customizable grids and alignment guides on any webpage.

extensions.title: Palette Picker
extensions.description: Instantly extracts color palettes from any webpage.

extensions.title: LinkChecker
extensions.description: Scans and highlights broken links on any page.

extensions.title: DOM Snapshot
extensions.description: Capture and export DOM structures quickly.

extensions.title: ConsolePlus
extensions.description: Enhanced developer console with advanced filtering and logging.
